nl.tudelft.jpacman.ui

Class PacManUiBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.jpacman.ui.PacManUiBuilder

  • public class PacManUiBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for the JPac-Man UI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PacManUiBuilder()
      Creates a new Pac-Man UI builder without any mapped keys or buttons.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addButton(java.lang.String caption, Action action)
      Adds a button to the UI.
      PacManUiBuilder addKey(java.lang.Integer keyCode, Action action)
      Adds a key listener to the UI.
      PacManUI build(Game game)
      Creates a new Pac-Man UI with the set keys and buttons.
      PacManUiBuilder withDefaultButtons()
      Adds a start and stop button to the UI.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PacManUiBuilder

        public PacManUiBuilder()
        Creates a new Pac-Man UI builder without any mapped keys or buttons.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public PacManUI build(Game game)
        Creates a new Pac-Man UI with the set keys and buttons.
        Parameters:
        game - The game to build the UI for.
        Returns:
        A new Pac-Man UI with the set keys and buttons.

      • addKey

        public PacManUiBuilder addKey(java.lang.Integer keyCode,
                              Action action)
        Adds a key listener to the UI.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - The key code of the key as used by KeyEvent.
        action - The action to perform when the key is pressed.
        Returns:
        The builder.

      • addButton

        public void addButton(java.lang.String caption,
                      Action action)
        Adds a button to the UI.
        Parameters:
        caption - The caption of the button.
        action - The action to execute when the button is clicked.

      • withDefaultButtons

        public PacManUiBuilder withDefaultButtons()
        Adds a start and stop button to the UI. The actual actions for these buttons will be added upon building the UI.
        Returns:
        The builder.
